Review Title: Terrible! Definitely not coming back again
Review Text: I lodged in this hotel back in October last year, and I had mixed feelings. I decided to try them out again in February to make up my mind, and it's a very clear NO.   First of all, when I arrived, I spent like five minutes at the gate honking, but no gateman was available. This consistent unavailability of gateman continued to happen through out my 2-day stay in this hotel. It was tiring. But that's not even the worst part.   The worst part of my stay has to be the receptionist. The last time I came, the guy that welcomed me was really nice and courteous, until a dismissive lady took over the next day. The major advantage of this hotel is its location. It nestled in a generally expensive neighbourhood, so it offers value at an affordable price. Thumbs up for that.  During my stay, things generally worked as they're supposed to, except for the faulty lighting in my room, which the staff were unable to fix for the 2 days I stayed at the hotel. Apart from that, everything else was decent; the bed was comfortable, the internet works (not fast, but good enough for work e-mails and calls), the breakfast was okay (although no options).  The staff was generally nice, but the receptionists were a mix bag. When I arrived, I met a guy who was exceptionally nice.
